metadata.title: CVE-2024-45795 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Suricata is a network Intrusion Detection System, Intrusion PreventionSystem and Network Security Monitoring engine. Prior to version 7.0.7,rules using datasets with the non-functional / unimplemented "unset" optioncan trigger an assertion during traffic parsing, leading to denial ofservice. This issue is addressed in 7.0.7. As a workaround, use onlytrusted and well tested rulesets.

criterions.comment: suricata package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
